review_data.title: Friendly staff, expensive bags and an observation deck

review_data.title: Casual dining at a good price
review_data.content: I was visiting some business associates who suggested this venue for lunch. There were three fixed menus as well as other options available. Food is not fine-dining by any menas but is great value, well cooked and prepared individually. If you are not worried by...More
